full_summary:
### Tender Notice

#### Facilitation Services for Virtual Training Delivery

Tender Solicitation Number: 100026412-A

**Title (English):** Facilitation services for the delivery of the virtual training "Nurturing Well-Being in Call Centres - Healthy Minds and Bodies"

**Title (French):** Services de facilitation pour la prestation de la formation virtuelle "Cultiver le bien-être en centre d’appels – Des corps et des esprits sains."

The Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) invites qualified service providers to submit a proposal for the delivery of facilitation services for the virtual training "Nurturing Well-Being in Call Centres - Healthy Minds and Bodies" (Cultiver le bien-être en centre d’appels – Des corps et des esprits sains).

**Key Dates:**

* **Tender Closing Date:** July 11, 2024, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date:** Not specified

**Bid Description:**

ESDC requires bid submission for the facilitation of virtual training courses to be delivered to ESDC Call Centre employees. The contract term for the initial period shall be from the contract award date to November 20th, 2024. Additionally, there is an option for extension up to March 31st, 2025. The sessions should be delivered from September 4th to November 20th, 2024.

**Procurement Method:**

This is a competitive and selective tendering process.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to any service provider who can submit a compliant proposal.

**Contact Information:**

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:
Cynthia Carty
ESDC
Email: [cynthia.carty@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:cynthia.carty@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 552-8150

This tender notice is issued in both official languages: English and French.

You can obtain the tender package and any subsequent notices and updates via the Government of Canada Tendering Website.

Check the attachments for the full tender notice and any related information. You can find the documents at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/...](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/...) <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/>
